sections.title: Purpose
sections.content: This document serves as a test case for the custom editor within the global memory bank context.

sections.title: Sample Data
sections.content:
Includes various data types:
- String: 'Example'
- Number: 123
- Boolean: true
- Array: [1, 2, 3]
- Object: { key: 'value' }
